docs.title: Welcome to GeniXCMS
docs.text: GeniXCMS is a PHP Based Content Management System and Framework (CMSF). It's a simple and lightweight of CMSF. Very suitable for Intermediate PHP developer to Advanced Developer. Even so, GeniXCMS can be used as ordinary website like blog, portals, company profile etc. It's built with a very user friendly themes to modify.

docs.title: Why GeniXCMS
docs.text:
This CMSF is a starter point to build your own online applications. With already build User manager, Content manager (Post, Pages), Menu manager, etc made you easy to add your own code and build your own custom web applications.

Even when You are not a programmer, you can build your own website using it. Very easy to manage.

docs.title: The Version
docs.text:
The development of GeniXCMS had been developed very slow these years, this is because the lack of time and power of the developer itself. The stable release of GeniXCMS was version 1.1.11. Even this version is still had so many bugs and need more improvement. However, we still can use it to make a website or a blog even a portal.

Meanwhile, at the back the author of these codes still doing improvement and fix some bugs itself. All fixes and improvement can be downloaded at the github master branch.

docs.title: About GeniXCMS
docs.text:
GeniXCMS is a free and open-source Content Management System (CMS) and framework. It's built using PHP and MySQL, and it's designed to be simple and lightweight. Here are some key features:

  • User-Friendly: It's easy to use, making it suitable for both beginners and intermediate developers.
  • Customizable: You can add your own code and build custom web applications.
  • Built with Open Source Software: It uses tools like Twitter Bootstrap, jQuery, Summernote, and more.
  • Responsive: It's designed to work well on both desktop and mobile devices.

GeniXCMS is a great choice if you're looking for a straightforward CMS to manage your website content

Years back then, the founder of GeniXCMS had a very affection from WordPress and CodeIgniter. So, to fulfill the easyness of managing website with an MVC stucture, He happily starting to write the GeniXCMS in 2014. That's the reason why the interface and dashboard look a like WordPress but in the backend the code had similarity with CodeIgniter.

As those years the use of Composer getting hype, it decided back then to use Composer to manage libraries which will be used. So not all of the code as written by Himself. Some of the code was using Libraries at the Packagist. It was decided to use it and that will the libraries management more easy.

docs.title: The Brand
docs.text: The name of GeniXCMS and Logo was registered ® at the Brand Database since 2018. The detail of the registration can be seen here

docs.title: Documentation
docs.text:
GeniXCMS had documentation website, which located at docs.genixcms.web.id

Please go to the website to read the documentation about GeniXCMS. The documentation is still not yet finished, just the important pages was written so far.
